needs: Seeking a part-time (20h/wk) Platform or DevOps lead engagement focused on measurable outcomes, clear signals, and pragmatic architecture. Objectives: deliver a thin vertical slice in the first 90 days, standardise IaC, reduce drift, cut MTTR, embed SLOs/runbooks and security-by-design while operating within budgets and governance.
personality: Empathetic, coaching-led engineer who prioritises ownership, evidence and velocity. Communicates via concise decision logs, design notes and short demos. Prefers experiments, small probes and data-driven iteration over debate. Mentors through pairing, values readable code, humane processes and clear accountability while surfacing unknowns early.
